# AI Prompts

This directory contains reusable prompt templates for AI-assisted development.

## Files

- **prompts.md** - Prompt template definitions and examples

## Purpose

Prompt templates provide:

- Consistent AI interaction patterns
- Reusable code generation templates
- Standardized documentation formats
- Common development task workflows

## Usage

Prompts are referenced by AI development tools to generate consistent, high-quality code and documentation that follows WordPress and theme development standards.
